name: Astronomic Impact
description:
Astronomic Impact is a bullet hell-like game where you control an asteroid that casually wants to destroy the earth.

For now, it is way too small for that. So on its way, it will need to consume smaller asteroids to grow and avoid bigger asteroid and missiles. Asteroids you can consume will have a blue outline so you don't make "size-check mistakes".

There are 3 phases of gameplay where asteroids rates and size as well as missile rates will increase.

Multiple endings are available.

This game was made during a Human Academy Game Jam, more info in the in-game credits.
